response.original_title: 稲川淳二 真相・恐怖の現場~禁断の地、再び~ VOL.1
response.overview: Although his day job is as a designer, Junji Inagawa is loved for his unique character and is active in a variety of venues as a TV personality. Especially in recent years, he has become an indispensable presence on summer nights as a ghost story teller. In this documentary, Junji Inagawa, the "S-class entertainer in the world of horror," visits two haunted places that are known for their horror stories. The film approaches the truth of two haunted places, one in Okinawa and the other in Tokyo.
response.title: Junji Inagawa - Revealing the Truth: Terrifying Sites - Forbidden Land, Once Again VOL.1

titles.title: 稲川淳二 真相・恐怖の現場 ～禁断の地、再び～ VOL.1
稲川淳二 真相 恐怖の現場 禁断の地、再び vol.1
